full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Request for Proposal - X-Ray Tubes

### Contract Information
* **Contract Title**: X-Ray Tubes
* **Contract Reference Number**: WS4378219315-Doc4378435527
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4378219315
* **Publication Date**: January 3, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 22, 2024, 2:00 PM EST (Note: Amendment to closing time as per attachments)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: Not specified
* **Expected Contract End Date**: Not specified
* **Contract Status**: Expiration
* **Solicitation Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal

### Goods and Services
* **UNSPSC Code**: 41111800 - Non destructive examination equipment
* **Description**: X-Ray Tubes
* **Commodity Code**: Other non-destructive testing and inspection equipment
* **Trade Agreements**: This solicitation is subject to various trade agreements, please refer to attachment.

### Contracting Entity Information
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5
* **End User Entity**: Department of National Defence (DND)

### Contact Information
* **Contact Person**: Stanley Chui, SPAC/PSPC
* **Email**: [stanley.chui@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:stanley.chui@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: Not specified
* **Fax**: Not specified

### Tender Description
Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by January 25, 2024, 2:00 PM EST. All bids submitted after 2:00 PM EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

### Attachments
No attachments are available at this time.

### Notice URL
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18417099?extsite=MTg0MTcwOTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Please note that a boxed offline list format has been avoided, instead the rewritten text formatted in nice markdown format for
